Description: Greenish colourless cast glass cup (skyphos) with a ground rim, and egg-shaped body, a thick stem hollow below and two ring handles; all carved from the same piece.
Bibliographic references: Tait 1991 / Five Thousand Years of Glass (pl.54)
Glass 2 / Catalogue of Greek and Roman Glass, Volume 2 (513)
Harden et al 1968 / Masterpieces of Glass (37)
